info.name: Learn Dvorak Dark Mode (Bruhdooh) v1.1
info.description: I made a dark mode for learn.dvorak.nl, since the main color of the website was an eye-burning yellow.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.0: Released 1/18/2019
Version 1.1: Reversed the colors on the pop-up keyboard to highlight the keys you should be using better.
